15.post_text:
Unsure whether or not you have locked your parked BMW and wish to lock it for peace of mind - without having to be close by? Want to activate the ventilation in your BMW before you reach your car on a hot day? 

With the new BMW ConnectedDrive and ‘My BMW Remote’ app, you can complete these tasks with ease.

16.post_text: #EscapeTheCity2015 is coming to an end. The drivers spent their Sunday snorkelling and taking part in a turtle release programme, before bidding goodbye to Pulau Redang this morning, and followed by a fruitful lunch in Kuantan. We wish all the 29 BMW owners a safe drive back home!

comments.message: How I wish I am there too Vincent! 😂

Yogiboy, be careful what you wish for in life cos they say dreams do come true, and that's what Performance Motorsports Circle has set out to do for all you members & PML loyalists. I'm sure we'll see you at the next drive with your new drive. Take care, bro. 😜👍

17.post_text:
29 BMW owners spent day 2 of #EscapeTheCity2015 driving to Kuala Terengganu, making a stop at Merang Jetty, before enjoying a boat ride to Pulau Redang. 

The drivers ended the fun-filled day with a BBQ dinner at The Taaras Beach & Spa Resort, which is surrounded by one of the bluest oceans on earth!

19.post_text: Day 1 of #EscapeTheCity2015 is almost over! 29 BMW owners made the drive up the Peninsular this morning, driving past breathtaking scenery and arresting vistas. They made a pit stop at Kuantan for some delectable seafood and will be indulging in fun-filled activities such as a boat ride at Pulau Redang and a BBQ dinner on the beach tomorrow.
